title: Orange Phase AD3 is an adaptive 3-wheeler eMTB with a leaning linkage
content:
The Orange Phase AD3 is about to win the internet. Alex Desmond of the Orange Bikes Strange Prototype Division has spent almost six years developing this adaptive eMTB specifically for ex-EWS racer Lorraine Truong.
